text.div:
Functional Status Assessment for Knee Replacement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    71969-0 PROMIS-10 Global Mental Health (GMH) score T-score
    71970-8 PROMIS-10 Global Mental Health (GMH) score
    71971-6 PROMIS-10 Global Physical Health (GPH) score T-score
    71972-4 PROMIS-10 Global Physical Health (GPH) score
    72009-4 VR-12 Mental health (MH) score - oblique method
    72010-2 VR-12 Role emotion (RE) score - oblique method
    72011-0 VR-12 Social functioning (SF) score - oblique method
    72012-8 VR-12 Vitality (VT) score - oblique method
    72013-6 VR-12 General health (GH) score - oblique method
    72014-4 VR-12 Bodily pain (BP) score - oblique method
    72015-1 VR-12 Role physical (RP) score - oblique method
    72016-9 VR-12 Physical functioning (PF) score - oblique method
    72017-7 VR-12 Mental health (MH) score - oblique method T-score
    72018-5 VR-12 Role emotion (RE) score - oblique method T-score
    72019-3 VR-12 Social functioning (SF) score - oblique method T-score
    72020-1 VR-12 Vitality (VT) score - oblique method T-score
    72021-9 VR-12 General health (GH) score - oblique method T-score
    72022-7 VR-12 Bodily pain (BP) score - oblique method T-score
    72023-5 VR-12 Role physical (RP) score - oblique method T-score
    72024-3 VR-12 Physical functioning (PF) score - oblique method T-score
    72025-0 VR-12 Physical component summary (PCS) score - oblique method T-score
    72026-8 VR-12 Mental component summary (MCS) score - oblique method T-score
    72027-6 VR-12 Physical component summary (PCS) score - orthogonal method T-score
    72028-4 VR-12 Mental component summary (MCS) score - orthogonal method T-score
    72098-7 Quality of life score [KOOS]
    72099-5 Sport-recreation score [KOOS]
    72100-1 Activities of daily living score [KOOS]
    72101-9 Symptoms score [KOOS]
    72102-7 Pain score [KOOS]
